snippet: Belarus’s president, Aleksandr G. Lukashenko, reacted sharply to a security breach in which Swedish pilots airdropped 800 stuffed bears bearing anti-authoritarian signs on Minsk.
abstract: Belarus Pres Aleksandr G Lukashenko has reacted sharply to a security breach in which Swedish pilots airdropped teddy bears bearing anti-authoritarian signs on Minsk, firing two generals and issuing a warning to his minister of defense.
lead_paragraph: Belarus’s president, Aleksandr G. Lukashenko, reacted sharply to a security breach in which Swedish pilots airdropped 800 stuffed bears bearing anti-authoritarian signs on Minsk.

headline.seo: In Belarus, Teddy Bears Defy Leader, Lukashenko
headline.main: Teddy Bears Fall From Sky, and Heads Roll in Minsk
headline.print_headline: Teddy Bears Fall From Sky, And Heads Roll in Minsk
